mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xinxifabu_name as xinxifabuName ,a.xinxifabu_types as xinxifabuTypes ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xinxifabu_photo as xinxifabuPhoto ,a.xinxifabu_address as xinxifabuAddress ,a.chongwu_types as chongwuTypes ,a.xinxifabu_time as xinxifabuTime ,a.xinxi_types as xinxiTypes ,a.xinxifabu_content as xinxifabuContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM xinxifabu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xinxifabu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuName},'%')
and a.xinxifabu_types = #{params.xinxifabuTypes}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.xinxifabu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuAddress},'%')
and a.chongwu_types = #{params.chongwuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xinxifabu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xinxifabuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xinxifabu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xinxifabuTimeEnd})
and a.xinxi_types = #{params.xinxiTypes}
and a.xinxifabu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinxifabuContent},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
